flawed_nl_solution:
Bucket A has 10 more seeds than bucket B: so there are 10 seeds + 30 seeds = <<10+30=40>>40 seeds in bucket A.
Bucket A and bucket B have 40 seeds + 30 seeds = <<40+30=40>>40 seeds together.
If there are 100 seeds in all the buckets, then bucket C has 100 seeds - 40 seeds = <<100-40=60>>60 seeds.
#### 60

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
